table.name: automatedbackup_settings
automatedbackup_logs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `automatedbackup_logs` ( `id` int(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT , `createdtime` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL , `filetype` varchar(255) NOT NULL , `filesize` varchar(255) NOT NULL , `path` varchar(255) NOT NULL , `deleted` int(1) NOT NULL , `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
